content.rendered:
Get ready for some high adrenaline fun in the Rockies! March kicks off the season for our Idaho Springs mountaintop ziplining course with trips at 9am and 12pm every Saturday and Sunday.

Come check out our mountain top zipline tours located just thirty minutes from downtown Denver! A winter zip line tour is the perfect way to cure that winter cabin fever and get out in the fresh air after a long cold winter. Or rest your legs after days of skiing while still getting a great kick of adrenaline. The days are getting longer, warmer, and sunnier!

Ziplining in the Colorado Rocky Mountains is an excellent family adventure and perfect for those looking to try something new and exciting.  You will find yourself zipping through tall trees as you gaze upon gorgeous mountain views and snowy forests. Our zipline course is perched high above our Idaho Springs rafting and zipline outpost. After a short scenic hike to the start of our course, you will take on six zips of various lengths and speeds before making a photo finish over Chicago Creek.

Join us in March, and take advantage of our Buy One, Get One Half Off deal for half day zipline tours in Idaho Springs. Make your reservation with AVA before March 1st to receive this discounted rate. At a time when outdoor activities are sparse, winter ziplining in Idaho Springs with AVA is the perfect activity to get a taste of outdoor adventure without having to travel far from home.
